Content.Text:
<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKNOWN>Ahem...I need some help. Somebody?
...Anybody? Is anyone even there?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKNOWN>Ah! You there. Perfect timing.
<PAGE>
Take these things and carry them up to that
room, would you?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<NAME_UNKNOWN>Ohohohoho! I like your enthusiasm. Now then,
chop chop!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKNOWN>And be sure they don't bump against the walls.
If anything breaks, I doubt you could afford to
replace it on your salary.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<NAME_UNKNOWN>My, my. You're stronger than you look. Very
well, then. You will make an acceptable new
servant.

<NAME_MOB_JOLENE>
L-lady Elise...! I humbly beg your pardon.
<PAGE>
It took longer than I expected to finish cleaning,
so I was unable to carry your things. I'll do that
right away.
<PAGE>
Oh? Everything is already here?

<NAME_MOB_ZAZIE>
Lady Elise! A thousand pardons, my lady...
<PAGE>
It took longer than I expected to finish cooking
and--
<PAGE>
Hmm? And who is this?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Is this not a new servant?

<NAME_MOB_JOLENE>
Er...this is the first time I've seen this person, my
lady.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<WINDOW_EXCLAMATION_R>EEEEEEEKK! A trespasser!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What were you thinking, walking into a lady's
home without permission?!

<NAME_MOB_JOLENE>
Y-yes, what indeed? When you do things like
that, we're the ones who take the heat for it!

<NAME_MOB_ZAZIE>
Lady Elise, shall we call for help?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm... No, not this time. I'm in a merciful mood
today, perhaps in thanks for carrying my things.

<NAME_MOB_JOLENE>
What?

<NAME_MOB_ZAZIE>
L-lady Elise? You won't yell this time?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
No. It looks like this 'trespasser' simply stopped
by to say hello and enthusiastically offered to
help -- far more so than any of you, I might add.
<PAGE>
Consider that a lesson in timely, pleasant
assistance.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SPECIAL>
I AM a farmer, after all. If I didn't show at least
this much graciousness, I'd be setting a poor
example.
<PAGE>
And you. How about showing your gratitude for
my kindhearted magnanimity?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SPECIAL>
Ohohohoho! Now, off with you!
<PAGE>
Next time, keep your manners in mind when you
come to call. There's a proper way to do these
things, after all!

<NAME_MOB_SAM>
Hurry to the manor. If you aren't quick, the Lady
will give you a scolding!

<NAME_MOB_SAM>
You got lost out here, didn't you? I knew I was
right to come looking for you.

<NAME_MOB_SAM>
Now isn't the time for questions! Come with me!

<NAME_MOB_SAM>
You there! Stop loafing around out here. You
should hurry and pay your respects to the Lady!

<NAME_MOB_SAM>
Look at this house you've built. Far too grand for
someone of your station, if I may be so frank.

<NAME_MOB_SAM>
Now isn't the time for questions! Come with me!
